record.title: CONSTITUTING THE MINORITY PARTY'S MEMBERSHIP ON CERTAIN COMMITTEES FOR THE 110TH CONGRESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate now proceed to the consideration of S. Res. 28, that the resolution be agreed to, and the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table.

record.chair: Is there objection? Without objection, it is so ordered.
